field_project_configuration.configuration_origin: dynamically_generated from the executable script name

technical_project_configuration.description: The following are example targets, modify/remove/add according to your project needs.

0_concepts.description00: The design goals of this IP address plan is to separate administration networks from operations networks.

build.description: your build server that does builds and is used for testing
build.name: build

docker_build.description: interaction with the docker build container
docker_build.name: docker_build

laptop.description: the local computer of the developer
laptop.name: laptop

ssh_cd.description: interaction with the combined ssh to test cd commands
ssh_cd.name: ssh_cd

tmux_cd.description: interaction with the tmux session to test cd commands
tmux_cd.name: tmux_cd

tmux_ssh_cd.description: interaction with the combined ssh / tmux session to test cd commands
tmux_ssh_cd.name: tmux_ssh_cd
tmux_ssh_cd.remote_policy1: ssh -o LogLevel=ERROR -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null root@172.17.0.2 tmux send-keys -t ssh_cd

all.description: used for processing of target files that are produced by other targets

builtin.description: the builtin target allows starting a new project and upgrading existing projects

docker.description: interaction with the docker build container

perl_examples.description: these are perl examples that explain how to use the APIs

python_examples.description: these are python examples that explain how to use the APIs

source_code.description: operations on the source code that is used for testing

wiki_gitlab.description: pulls the wiki pages from gitlab (and possibly other sources) and converts them PDF (or other formats)
